data.title: 准备以至少 30 秒的时间回答以下问题
data.subject: Talk about the last time you went shopping.
data.answer: The last time I went shopping for clothes, I took my best friend Mary with me to Westfield. I hate shopping with my mother because I tend to browse a number of stores before making my final decision, but she isn't very patient. On the other hand, Mary always tells me when she thinks a color doesn't suit me. But my mother is like "Okay, okay, it's perfect, you don't need to try another, come on, come on, let's go" which is kind of annoying. I bought a plain white cotton shirt, a yellow top, and a light blue coat. I love my new coat. Generally, I go shopping once or twice a month. Depending on the day, I like to shop at shopping centers or in local shops. And I usually go shopping when there are discounts, bargains or sales. I haven't got a lot of money and I am also saving money to pay my fees at university. (160字)
